metadata.Title: STEMP_EPIC
metadata.Authors: Kenneth N. Potter; Jimmy R. Williams
metadata.Extended description: Determines daily soil temperature by layer using the EPIC method (Potter & Williams, 1994). It computes surface temperature from air temperatures, a 30‑day wet‑day fraction, and surface cover (biomass, mulch, snow), then propagates temperature into soil layers using a bulk‑density dependent damping depth and potential extractable soil water. Outputs include surface temperature (SRFTEMP) and layer temperatures (ST).
metadata.Short description: Daily soil temperature by layer using the EPIC method.
